title.text: Microsoft .NET Framework 1.1 SP1 Security Update for Windows Server 2003 x86 and Windows Server 2003 R2 x86 (KB979907)

description.text: A security issue has been identified that could allow an attacker to tamper with digitally signed content without being detected, when this content is being consumed by an application that makes use of the Microsoft .NET Framework on a Windows-based system. You can help protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
